description: Episode of Series "This Modern Age". Part of a series of films on the importance of coal in the national economy of Great Britain, examining the problems facing the National Coal Board in 1947. This film makes an urgent plea for recognition of the coal industry to Britain and the steps that must be takn to stabilise the industry and increase its output.
